name: Grill Daddy Prototype
description:
You play as the dad at a grill at a barbeque. Grill the steaks to the requested cook level: rare, medium rare, medium, or well done.

Press X to slap down some steaks!

Move the mouse to move the spatula.

Right mouse click to switch the spatula from above or below the meat.

While above, left click presses the steak and speeds up cooking time.

While below, left click picks up the steaks. Drop the meat by releasing left click, and try to drop them on the plate or they will be trashed!
